turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'd like to schedule an appointment with Dr. Emily Carter.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, I can help with that. Are you an existing patient, or are you new to the practice?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: I'm an existing patient. I haven't been in for a check-up in…well, longer than I'd like to admit.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: No problem. Let me check Dr. Carter's availability. What's your preferred day of the week and time of day?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Ideally, a Tuesday or Wednesday afternoon would work best. But honestly, I'm pretty flexible.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, one moment. Looking at Tuesday, July 16th, we have an opening at 2:30 PM. On Wednesday, July 17th, we have availability at 1:00 PM and 4:00 PM. Does any of those work for you?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Ugh, those are all cutting it close with my work schedule. Are there any other options, maybe the following week?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Certainly, checking the week of July 22nd. What about Monday, July 22nd at 10:00 AM, or Thursday, July 25th at 9:00 AM?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hmm... Thursday the 25th at 9:00 AM. Could you tell me, approximately how long will the appointment be? I need to factor in travel time and everything.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Typically, a routine check-up with Dr. Carter lasts about 45 minutes to an hour. Please arrive 15 minutes early to complete any necessary paperwork. So July 25th at 9AM is confirmed, is that correct?
